name: The Brimstone Project: Odyssey Live
storyline: In the town of Löwenberg, people are disappearing. Authorities and investigators are at a loss, and the population is unsettled. In this cyber thriller, you play as members of the Berlin hacker group "Alderbrook Initiative" and suddenly receive a mysterious phone call. Now, you must use your skills to solve the mystery behind the missing persons cases. Watch the trailer.
summary: At The Brimstone Project, you will be tested in various ways. Control drones, find data on target individuals, and gain access to the necessary information. Throughout, you'll be in constant contact with Anna, your contact at the Initiative. Diverse puzzles await you, demanding different skills. But beware: your actions have consequences. Depending on how well you perform, the course of the story will change.
